column3:
FF 9000 for enroute ingress
At +0:30 SP1: -1 direct SP2; -2 turns to SP2 when established 1-2nm TRAIL
At +4:00 SP2: -4.5K FPM descent, hold FF 9000, DROP BAGS, FENCE IN
Ingress SP2 at 250AGL BUSTER (-1 at SP2 +1-2nm), remain 250AGL to IP SP6
2x AGM-65G on TARGET SP7 remain <700AGL on run-in, off RIGHT SP8
Egress SP8-SP10 at 250AGL, BUSTER
At SP10, FF9000 climb FL250, direct SP11, FENCE OUT
At SP11, check-in V3 (flight) and U2 (SENTRY), RTB SP12
column4:
Taxi Order: Rattler 5 → Venom 3 → Python 7 → Lobo 1
SP8 is not refined; marks last known location (approximately 3 hours old)
Locate, mark, and destroy the four TR-Ls; Snow Drift radar is NOT a priority target

SA-11 Attack Profile: 
  • 1-mile trail, ingress from the SW, attack direction NE 
  • Maintain altitude, Gate, > M1.0 
  • Single bomb all four targets
